name: The Coachman Inn

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel over Memorial Weekend.
reviews.title: Beautiful Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It wasn't a great hotel but there isn't much to choose from in this area either.
reviews.title: I think this place is great

reviews.text: We stayed in a regular room with two beds and other family members stayed in a larger room with two beds. If I had to stay here again I would get the larger room with two beds and a kitchenette, more room.
reviews.title: Great scenery

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel staff and housekeeping are great.
reviews.title: As A travel agent I loved it!

likes.liked: — The big rooms and the cleaness
likes.disliked: — the breakfast was not that great, but it was okay

reviews.title: Great Rooms and Awesome Service
reviews.text: I have been staying at this hotel on a somewhat regular basis for the past three years and have found it comfortable, well decorated and with very pleasant employees. The staff treat you as family and are not rude or "stuffy". The hot tub and pool always seems to be clean although I rarely use them. The continental breakfast provided has a few more items that one typically finds at other hotels.

reviews.title: Rash Randy's Rating
reviews.text: The addition of free wireless internet also adds to the appeal. Other hotels will charge a fee for this, however, the folks at Coachman do not. Huge plus if you require internet. They also have a public computer to access the internet in the lobby if you desire.

description: Welocme to the world of old-fashioned hospitality. Explore the many options of our immaculate 100 rooms and conference inn. All rooms provide full baths with shower and tub, coffee makers, small refrigerators, hair dryers and free high speed wireless internet service. Many of our rooms also have extra special features like Jacuzzi tubs and kitchenettes. Each room is individually decorated for that unique personal touch.
